snippet.title: Twitter: Here Are The Most Popular Tweets of 2013
snippet.description: Tragedy and coming of age dominated the year’s most popular tweets. Twitter released some year-end stats today, and topping the list of most re-tweeted Tweets came from Glee’s Lea Michele after reporting the loss of co-star Cory Monteith. Another significant moment occurred after Fast and Furious Actor Paul Walker passed away and a statement [...] read »

snippet.title: The Law of 250. Joe Girard's Sales Strategy Wins The Millennial Vote, Not Twitter Or Facebook
snippet.description: Although the media and political analysts are dissecting it to no end, something has been glossed over in the new Pew Research report on Millennials - the power of a magical number in life which sales guru Joe Girard identified decades ago. read »

snippet.title: What Justin Bieber's Twitter Hack Teaches Us About Social Media Security
snippet.description: Justin Bieber's 50 million follower strong Twitter account was hijacked briefly a couple of days ago and now that the dust has settled it seems like a good opportunity to review how these attacks happen and what all of us (pop stars included) should learn about Twitter security.
